# ASCP BOC {-}

Source: <a href="https://www.ascp.org/content/board-of-certification/get-credentialed#" target="_blank">MLT(ASCP) and MLS(ASCP) Certifications > Applicant Resources > Content Guideline</a>

ASCP BOC's Content Guideline for the Medical Laboratory Technician, MLT(ASCP), and the Medical Laboratory Scientist, MLS(ASCP), certification exams consists of one major content area for Urinalysis and Body Fluids. The information below was last revised on ASCP's website July 2025

## **Urinalysis & Body Fluids** {-}

**Exam Percentage** MLT(ASCP): 5% - 10% | MLS(ASCP): 5% - 10%

**Description** Physical and chemical testing, microscopic analysis, physiology, disease states
